dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1120 IH: Abolish the Fogarty International Center Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gill of Texas (for himself, Ms. Greene of Georgia, Mr. Burlison, and Mr. Ogles) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To abolish the John E. Fogarty International Center for Advanced Study in the Health Sciences.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Abolish the Fogarty International Center Act of 2025.
The John E. Fogarty International Center for Advanced Study in the Health Sciences is abolished.
